title: Standard Personal Loan
description: A flexible loan designed for personal needs, offering quick approval and competitive rates. Use it for unexpected expenses, debt consolidation, or a major purchase.

title: Residential Mortgage
description: Secure your dream home with our long-term mortgage plans. Enjoy low fixed interest rates and flexible payment schedules tailored to your financial timeline.

title: Small Business Capital
description: Fuel your startup or expand your existing enterprise with dedicated business capital. Fast turnaround for investment and growth opportunities.

title: Auto Financing
description: Drive away today with competitive auto loan rates. Simple application process for new or used vehicles.

title: Higher Education Fund
description: Invest in your future with an education loan covering tuition, books, and living expenses. Deferred payment options available.

title: Working Capital Advance
description: Quick access to funds to cover immediate operational needs or cash flow gaps. Ideal for small, unexpected business costs.
